did.abstract: Record book. Also, printed volume, MANUAL OF THE FIRST PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH, SYRACUSE, N.Y., 1895, by George P. Spaulding.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Record book, 1823-1852. Also, printed volume, MANUAL OF THE FIRST PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH, SYRACUSE, N.Y., 1895, by George P. Spaulding.
